faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Swiss Healthcare Staffing

q1.question: How does the platform handle Cross-Border (Frontalier) taxation?
q1.answer: Our payroll engine automatically handles Source Tax (Quellensteuer) calculations for permit holders (G-Permit), ensuring full compliance with cantonal tax laws.

q2.question: Is the digital signature legally binding?
q2.answer: Yes. We utilize Qualified Electronic Signatures (QES) or Advanced Electronic Signatures (AES) for all contracts, fully compliant with the Swiss Code of Obligations (OR).

q3.question: Can we use the software without the marketplace?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Many institutions use our 'SaaS-Only' mode to manage their internal teams, utilizing the whitelist features and roster planning solely for their own employees.

q4.question: How is data privacy handled regarding patient data?
q4.answer: The platform is designed for workforce management, not patient records. However, any internal notes or incident reports are encrypted at rest and in transit, hosted in ISO-certified Swiss data centers.
